infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Window needs access to your camera to add media to posts, projects, and accounts.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Window needs access to photos/videos to add media to posts, projects, and accounts.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Window needs access to contacts to find your friends in the app
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: For downloading and saving photos/videos in messenger feature
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Window uses your location to find nearby projects and suggest your city when adding records.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Window uses your location to find nearby projects and suggest your city when adding records.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Window needs access to microphone to record video.

plugins.photosPermission: Window needs access to photos/videos to add media to posts, projects, and accounts.
plugins.cameraPermission: Window needs access to your camera to add media to posts, projects, and accounts.
plugins.microphonePermission: Window needs access to microphone to record video.

plugins.photosPermission: Window needs access to photos/videos to add media to posts, projects, and accounts.
